column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Andrew - Thank you for the great review! We really appreciate it. Not many people know that the valet service in the parking garage is free (though the valet guys rely on tips to earn their keep)
column2: so that's always an option. However
column3: in the coming months we plan to open more JINYA locations in Houston
column4: which may alleviate some of the crowds that flock to our Midtown spot. And
column6: you're correct that we are franchise
column7: but I'm a lifelong resident of Houston
column8: and my general manager Keith is BOI (born on the island) from Galveston. So as far as our bench is concerned
